popularityCurve.label: i'm pleased this bill supports our men and women in uniform who are deployed in defense of freedom and gives them the resources they deserve and need to accomplish their mission

clusterList.phrase: i'm pleased this bill supports our men and women in uniform who are deployed in defense of freedom and gives them the resources they deserve and need to accomplish their mission
i'm pleased we were able to provide this funding so that all of our soldiers have the resources and tools they need to complete their missions
this will ease the burden on our forces it will make life easier for our wonderful military families
will relieve the burden on our forces and it will make life easier for our wonderful military families

during hurricane katrina we had great support from all the other national guard states and to be able to come out here and return that favor and support the state of california and calfire and the california national guard is a great opportunity

we have come to express our gratitude and appreciation for the sacrifices made by these great warriors soldiers in freeing the iraqi people and in helping us in iraq recover from tyranny and dictatorship
gratitude and appreciation for the sacrifices made by these great warrior-soldiers in the freeing of the iraqi people and in helping us in iraq to recover from tyranny and dictatorship
the speak out for military kids program provides a venue for military kids to get together and share their experiences
in the somk program military and non-military youth apply and are chosen to be trained to go out into the community to raise awareness of military family issues and foster community support
this program is a wonderful way to support and to show appreciating for those military families who sacrifice so much for their country
we are delighted to bring this program to the children of soldiers living in our community

the armed services ymca is extremely proud to work with the jolie-pitt foundation to enable military children and their families to succeed this donation will go a long way towards helping children affected by the stark realities of war

ssfoa is dedicated to supporting and assisting the wounded and their families of all branches of service and all wars our goal is to recognize the blood sacrifice of our wounded and injuries or illness that originated in a war zone including purple heart recipients victims of friendly fire those who suffer from ptsd agent orange effects and gulf war syndrome we are also advocates for the wounded and assist in educating the public concerning their plight ssfoa is a member of america supports you and is working together with other asy organizations to support our wounded service members in the way they deserve
relieves the burden on our forces and it will make life easier for our wonderful military families
